name: get-gene-coding-sequence
title: Get Gene Coding Sequence from NCBI
description: Retrieve coding sequences for genes from NCBI Entrez database
content:
Overview

This application retrieves the coding sequence(s) of a specified gene from the NCBI Entrez database using gene name and organism.

Features

  • Searches NCBI gene database
  • Returns RefSeq ID and sequence
  • Extracts coding sequences (exons only)
  • Supports any organism in NCBI

Parameters

  • Gene Name: Gene symbol (e.g., TP53, BRCA1)
  • Organism: Species name (e.g., "Homo sapiens", "Mus musculus")
  • Email: Email for NCBI (optional but recommended)

Output

Returns a JSON file with RefSeq IDs and coding sequences for the specified gene.
command: git clone https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git prod_apps_clone 2>/dev/null || (cd prod_apps_clone && git pull) && pip install -q biopython biomni && python prod_apps_clone/biomni/molecular_biology/get_gene_coding_sequence.py "${geneName}" "${organism}" ${email} -o "${outputDir}"
